name: Wordle
description: The classic game where you guess a five-letter word in six tries or less by receiving feedback on correct letters and their positions.

name: Dordle
description: You can do 1 Wordle. But can you do 2 Wordles simultaneously?

name: Trodle
description: Inspired from the other Wordle games, Trodle is a combination of 3 Wordles simultaneously

name: Quordle
description: Same as Wordle except you've to do 4 different Wordles simultaneously.

name: Hexordle
description: Made by Jeffrey Chen in 2022, Hexordle is 6 different Wordles at the same time.

name: Octordle
description: Same as Wordle except you've to do 8 different Wordles simultaneously.

name: Sedecordle
description: Same as Wordle except you've to do 16 different Wordles simultaneously.

name: Duotrigordle
description: Same as Wordle except you've to do 32 different Wordles simultaneously because why not '-'

name: Sexaginta-Quattuordle
description: Same as Wordle except you've to do 64 different Wordles simultaneously. You can do it ðŸ¤Œ

name: Kilordle
description: Wordle is fun. How about a thousand of them at the same time. How does that feel?

name: Myriadle
description: No, there is no extra zero by mistake. That is ten thousand, yes you read it right. 10k Wordles.

name: QWordle
description: The Q in Wordle stands for 'Quantum' where there are 2 different Wordles merged into an entangled-pair.

name: Polygonle
description: Polygonle features a character cursor for visualizing words without filling every letter. Click a tile to fill it and navigate the cursor with spacebar or arrow keys instead of typing.
